task.summary: Default task
Replaces Old-Standard font with variant that renders well on Windows also.
Populates in-play panes. Stuff is now there although rough and doesn't do much.
Refactors CSS into small dedicated stylesheets.
Fixes CSS bugs introduced in last commit.
Powers now switch between in-play and out-of-play as intended.
Adds step to inventory item creation, so they can't be modified once created.
Refactoring. Makes recursive control creation a bit more straightforward.
Cleanup, plus fix bug calculating number of active powers.
We can now use powers to spend Mind or Body, and stamina behaves like it should in and out of combat.
Stunts now also work.
Rearranges panes for clarity.
Visual polish, mostly.
Adds specialisations selector to weapon item. The idea is to use the data to help resolve attacks in play mode.
Click on a weapon in combat to set its properties on the resolver pane.
Cleaner UI for creating weapons.
Sorted inventory.
Clearer to read task resolution.
More color codes for task resolution.
Handles defence and taking damage, rudimentarily.
Sets armour from what's worn (in inventory).
Compute stamina penalty as per the rules.
Tweaked Armour rules: got rid of stamina penalty and gave Medium and Heavy armours an initiative/move penalty.
Comments and cleanup mostly, but also fixes some bugs and makes some cosmetic tweaks.
Implements possibility to set stats from traits. Used with jagun adaptation to give armour. Then uses this base armour in computations in-play.
Implements oga control and fixes problem with incorrectly set knack cap for archetypes which allow bonus knacks.
Terminology and text update.
Fixes layout issue with NumbersPane (not laid out properly after mode switch).
Fixes issues with bonus knacks losing their "combat" property and getting placed in the wrong spot in the knacks pane, and adds a confirmation when switching back from Play to Rest mode.
Cleanup of fonts which have been moved to shared resources to avoid unnecessary reloading, points links from data to new permalinks in manual, and improves trait description display.
Adds link to new homepage.
Fixes issues with descriptions repeating, introduced in previous commit.
We have editable feature descriptions across the board.
Upload and download characters.
We can print.
Cleans up menus. Ready for a new upload...
Removes trailing comma.
Only adds menu separator to _ekipMenu if any stored characters are present.
Renames Watch to Overwatch and adjusts the description to reflect the rule change in the Sourcebook.
Change in wording.
We have support for portraits.
Solves problem where transitioning back to splash leaves it sometimes zoomed all the way in to red.
Better mode switching.
Harmonizes chrome across assets.
Improvements to portrait and print.
Some improvements to print, plus clearer Task Resolver interface, which now displays target number to beat, automatic success, and inevitable failure.
Updates formula for calculating damage to match changes in Sourcebook, and fixes bug with combat after returning to base and entering Play mode again.
Better calculation and display of defence actions.
Fixes bug resolving defence reactions.
Switches to Flat theme, fixes a bug, and displays juju cost in add button.

MESSAGE.value: Terminology and text update.
Fixes layout issue with NumbersPane (not laid out properly after mode switch).
Fixes issues with bonus knacks losing their "combat" property and getting placed in the wrong spot in the knacks pane, and adds a confirmation when switching back from Play to Rest mode.
Cleanup of fonts which have been moved to shared resources to avoid unnecessary reloading, points links from data to new permalinks in manual, and improves trait description display.
Adds link to new homepage.
Fixes issues with descriptions repeating, introduced in previous commit.
We have editable feature descriptions across the board.
Upload and download characters.
We can print.
Cleans up menus. Ready for a new upload...
Removes trailing comma.
Only adds menu separator to _ekipMenu if any stored characters are present.
Renames Watch to Overwatch and adjusts the description to reflect the rule change in the Sourcebook.
Change in wording.
We have support for portraits.
Solves problem where transitioning back to splash leaves it sometimes zoomed all the way in to red.
Better mode switching.
Harmonizes chrome across assets.
Improvements to portrait and print.
Some improvements to print, plus clearer Task Resolver interface, which now displays target number to beat, automatic success, and inevitable failure.
Updates formula for calculating damage to match changes in Sourcebook.
Updates formula for calculating damage to match changes in Sourcebook, and fixes bug with combat after returning to base and entering Play mode again.
Better calculation and display of defence actions.
Fixes bug resolving defence reactions.
Switches to Flat theme, fixes a bug, and displays juju cost in add button.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Switches to Flat theme, fixes a bug, and displays juju cost in add button.
